entry.title: A list of science labs that rocks
entry.content:
I will make a list of science labs activities which are so fun and interesting that you can't miss.

Real Labs
+ Mystery tube(modeling), see lesson plan
观察和记录现象；根据现象猜想和建构模型；做出预期并验证模型；交流、修正和完善模型。
+ Candle in the tube above water(causal model)
+ Timms video JP5 AIR COMPRESSION AND EXPANSION
+ Transpiration lab
+ Cell theory and plant respiration G8
+ Water quality - Critical thinking in science
+ Amazing amaryllis activitiesm G2-3 4Ws

Hands on activities
+ Sourdough Science!
+ Making a safty harmer
+ Design a sprinkler head for watering lawn

Virual Labs/ Simulations
+ Next Generation Science Standards simulation activities in Concord
+ PhET: Free online simulations
+ Interactive simulation based inquiry activities - Chunlei's Blog
